snippet: Rumors of the death of the writer Clive James have inspired assessments of his career and given him an opening to promote his latest material.
abstract: Rumors that writer and broadcaster Clive James was dying have inspired assessments of his career and given him an opening to promote his latest work, a translation of Dante's Divine Comedy.
lead_paragraph: Rumors of the death of the writer Clive James have inspired assessments of his career and given him an opening to promote his latest material.

headline.main: A Writer With Wit and Bite Proves He’s Not Dead Yet
headline.print_headline: A Writer With Wit and Bite Proves He’s Not Dead Yet
